name: Looney Tunes Double Pack: Dizzy Driving / Acme Antics
description:
Looney Tunes Double Pack is a compilation of two Looney Tunes games not available separately.
  • In Dizzy Driving, Bugs, Daffy, Tweety, and other from the gang race on tracks in vehicles using a top-down perspective. There are eight racers available.

  • In Acme Antics, Wile E. Coyote needs to catch Road Runner in side-scrolling levels shown from a side view. Road Runner needs to avoid obstacles and fight boss coyotes.
